## IHidChannel.setFeatureReport() method

Writes a feature [IHidReport](./jabra-js.ihidreport.md) to the device.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setFeatureReport(usagePage: number, usage: number, value: number | number[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  usagePage | number | The Usage Page of the feature report. |
|  usage | number | The Usage of the report. |
|  value | number \| number\[\] | The new value of that feature. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
